Caption: On the front row, from the left; Prof. Murugesan (on deputation from IIT Bombay to IIT Madras to set up the TV lab), Prof. Achyutan (Technical Assistant), Prof. S. Srinivasan (Incharge of Centre of Continuing Education).The last person is an Engineer deputed from Doordarshan to set up the TV lab. On the second row, from the left; xxx, a German Technician, xxx, Prof. Bough (probably)
Note: Informations are given by Prof. V.J.K. Murti
